price: 42. Ga samen met jouw broer met Mijn tekenen en jullie beiden mogen niet verslappen of zwak worden in de Gedenkenis tot Mij.
arabic: ٱذۡهَبۡ أَنتَ وَأَخُوكَ بِـَٔايَٰتِي وَلَا تَنِيَا فِي ذِكۡرِي

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: idh'hab anta wa-akhūka biāyātī walā taniyā fī dhik'rī
